<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Conceited Mindset](/Feats.aspx?ID=1668) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects. If you succeed at a save against a mental effect, you critically succeed instead; similarly, if you fail at a save against a mental effect, you critically fail instead.
name: Conceited Mindset
